name: Mashal Social Welfare Society
briefDescription: Mashal Social Welfare Society (MSWS) is the indigenous-tribal, non-political, non religious, nonprofit making and nongovernmental tribal development organization. committed and dedicated for the comprehensive welfare and the development of tribal people and their Art & craft, Handloom rich cultural heritage who are deprive and exploited from thousand years by the dominate society. The MSWS has been working in the Delhi as well as remote areas of the Jharkhand, Chhattisgarh and Orissa since 1999. The society is legally registered under societyâ€™s registration Act XXI of 1860 in 2005. Society has been organizing different programme for empowering the tribal and disadvantages sections of the society. Especially to generate awareness and extend technical knowledge for tribal to extend social justice, helping them to live life with full confidence and dignity of life for overall development of tribal communities. For this we are organizing workshop seminar on many tribal issue.  Organized many exhibition and cultural events to protect and promote their art and craft and cultural heritage.
